sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM message WHERE receiver_email = #userid# ORDER BY date desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO message(receiver_email, sender_email, content, date) VALUES(#receiver_email#, #sender_email#, #content#, SYSDATE())
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM message WHERE receiver_email = #receiver_email# AND sender_email = #sender_email# AND date = #date#
